languages.text:
{n}Ксенос cклоняет голову набок, глядя на Ирлиэт.{/n}
"Осколки колыбели тлеют там,
Где Буря всех стянула воедино.
Рискнешь ли руку в пламя погрузить
И угли правды вытащить на свет?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ксенос cклоняет голову набок, глядя на Ирлиэт.{/n}
"Осколки колыбели тлеют там,
Где Буря всех стянула воедино.
Рискнешь ли руку в пламя погрузить
И угли правды вытащить на свет?"
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}The xenos tilts his head, staring at Yrliet.{/n}
"The cradle's fragments smoulder dimly there,
Where tight has drawn the Tempest all together.
Dare you plunge your hand into the flame,
And drag truth's embers out into the light?"
languages.original_text:
{n}Ксенос cклоняет голову набок, глядя на Ирлиэт.{/n}

languages.text:
{n}丑角歪着头，盯着伊莉耶特。{/n}
“摇篮的碎片，散发着朦胧的烟霾，
它呼唤着，将所有暴风召集而来。
你敢将你的手伸入烈焰里吗？
将真相的余烬带到光芒之下？”
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos tilts his head, staring at Yrliet.{/n}
"The cradle's fragments smoulder dimly there,
Where tight has drawn the Tempest all together.
Dare you plunge your hand into the flame,
And drag truth's embers out into the light?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}丑角歪着头，盯着伊莉耶特。{/n}
“摇篮的碎片，散发着朦胧的烟霾，
它呼唤着，将所有暴风召集而来。
你敢将你的手伸入烈焰里吗？
将真相的余烬带到光芒之下？”
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}El xenos ladea la cabeza con la mirada fija en Yrliet.{/n}
«Los fragmentos de la cuna arden allí con debilidad,
donde la Tormenta aprieta con más fuerza.
¿Meterás la mano en el fuego con temeridad
para sacar las ascuas de la verdad y que todos las vean?».
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos tilts his head, staring at Yrliet.{/n}
"The cradle's fragments smoulder dimly there,
Where tight has drawn the Tempest all together.
Dare you plunge your hand into the flame,
And drag truth's embers out into the light?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}El xenos ladea la cabeza con la mirada fija en Yrliet.{/n}

¿Meterás la mano en el fuego con temeridad
para sacar las ascuas de la verdad y que todos las vean?».
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}異種族は頭を傾けて、ユリエットをジッと見た。{/n}
「嵐を固く引き寄せた場所で
ゆりかごの破片がぼんやりとくすぶる
その炎に手を差し入れ
真実の種火を表に引きずりだす覚悟はあるか？」
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos tilts his head, staring at Yrliet.{/n}
"The cradle's fragments smoulder dimly there,
Where tight has drawn the Tempest all together.
Dare you plunge your hand into the flame,
And drag truth's embers out into the light?"

traits.locale_text:
{n}異種族は頭を傾けて、ユリエットをジッと見た。{/n}
「嵐を固く引き寄せた場所で
ゆりかごの破片がぼんやりとくすぶる
その炎に手を差し入れ
真実の種火を表に引きずりだす覚悟はあるか？」
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}Der Xenos neigt den Kopf und starrt Yrliet an.{/n}
"Der Wiege Fragmente, sie glühen dort,
wo eng der Sturm rafft alles zusammen.
Wagt Ihr, die Hand zu stecken ins Feuer,
und die Glut der Wahrheit hervorzuziehen?"
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos tilts his head, staring at Yrliet.{/n}
"The cradle's fragments smoulder dimly there,
Where tight has drawn the Tempest all together.
Dare you plunge your hand into the flame,
And drag truth's embers out into the light?"

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}Le xénos penche la tête sur le côté en regardant Yrliet.{/n}
« Les fragments du berceau se consument lentement
Là où la Tempête a rassemblé tous les éléments.
Oserez-vous plonger la main dans le bûcher
Pour montrer à tous les braises de la vérité ? »
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos tilts his head, staring at Yrliet.{/n}
"The cradle's fragments smoulder dimly there,
Where tight has drawn the Tempest all together.
Dare you plunge your hand into the flame,
And drag truth's embers out into the light?"

languages.text:
{n}Zeno, başını yana çevirip bakışlarını Yrliet'e yöneltiyor.{/n}
"Loş parlar yurdun parçalarının ışığı,
Kasırga hepsini topladı sıkı sıkı.
Var mı cesaretin elini aleve sokmaya,
Hakikatin közünü dışarı çıkarmaya?"
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos tilts his head, staring at Yrliet.{/n}
"The cradle's fragments smoulder dimly there,
Where tight has drawn the Tempest all together.
Dare you plunge your hand into the flame,
And drag truth's embers out into the light?"
